question: Ved Parkash Mehta, who was seen in news recently, was associated with which field?
explanation:
Ved Parkash Mehta was a well-known Indian-American novelist and journalist who died recently, at the age of 86 years.
He was visually challenged from a very early age and was known for the monumental autobiography, through which he introduced Americans to Indian history and culture. He was associated with the New Yorker magazine for a long time.
